binary_woarchive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_BINARY_WOARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BINARY_WOARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // binary_woarchive.hpp
00011

00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 #ifdef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTREAMBUF
00021 #error "wide char i/o not supported on this platform"
00022 #else
00023 
00024 #include <ostream>
00025 #include <boost/archive/binary_oarchive_impl.hpp>
00026 
00027 namespace boost { 
00028 namespace archive {
00029 
00030 // do not derive from this class.  If you want to extend this functionality
00031 // via inhertance, derived from binary_oarchive_impl instead.  This will
00032 // preserve correct static polymorphism.
00033 class binary_woarchive : 
00034     public binary_oarchive_impl<
00035             binary_woarchive, std::wostream::char_type, std::wostream::traits_type
00036         >
00037 {
00038 public:
00039     binary_woarchive(std::wostream & os, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00040         binary_oarchive_impl<
00041             binary_woarchive, std::wostream::char_type, std::wostream::traits_type
00042         >(os, flags)
00043     {}
00044     binary_woarchive(std::wstreambuf & bsb, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00045         binary_oarchive_impl<
00046             binary_woarchive, std::wostream::char_type, std::wostream::traits_type
00047         >(bsb, flags)
00048     {}
00049 };
00050 
00051 typedef binary_woarchive naked_binary_woarchive;
00052 
00053 } // namespace archive
00054 } // namespace boost
00055 
00056 // required by export
00057 BOOST_SERIALIZATION_REGISTER_ARCHIVE(boost::archive::binary_woarchive)
00058 
00059 #endif // BOOST_NO_STD_WSTREAMBUF
00060 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BINARY_WOARCHIVE_HPP
